sn20.11:1.2: “Assuttha no tumhe, bhikkhave, rattiya paccusasamayam jarasingalassa vassamanassa”ti?
sn20.11:1.4: “Eso kho, bhikkhave, jarasingalo ukkandakena nama rogajatena phuttho.
sn20.11:1.5: So yena yena icchati tena tena gacchati;
sn20.11:1.6: yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha titthati;
sn20.11:1.7: yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha nisidati;
sn20.11:1.8: yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha nipajjati;
sn20.11:1.10: Sadhu khvassa, bhikkhave, yam idhekacco sakyaputtiyapatinno evarupampi attabhavapatilabham patisamvediyetha.
